prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, and Piano, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, and Piano, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This song has Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, and Piano, but not Organ.
